Text saved: At Girox Foods, we have an `employee turnover` of about 12% each year, which is the number of employees who leave the company. The main aim of this report is to look into the reasons for `employee engagement` in the company. `Employee engagement` means how interested and involved employees are in their work. Based on what we find, we will suggest ways to make employees feel better about their place of work and to keep more employees.
